baseEmail.ignoreMessage: If you did not request this email, please disregard this message.

resetPassword.subject: {{appName}} - Password Reset
resetPassword.title: Hello, {{userName}}
resetPassword.body1: Your access password for {{appName}} will be changed.
resetPassword.body2: Click the link below and enter a new password:
resetPassword.footer: Thank you for registering with {{appName}}. This is an automatically generated message. Please do not reply to this email.

enrollAccount.subject: {{appName}} - User Registration
enrollAccount.title: Hello, {{userName}}
enrollAccount.body1: Your registration at {{appName}} was carried out by an administrator.
enrollAccount.body2: Click the link below to create your access password:
enrollAccount.footer: Thank you for registering with {{appName}}. This is an automatically generated message. Please do not reply to this email.

create.name: Create user

checkIfHasAdminUser.name: Check if there is an admin user
checkIfHasAdminUser.description: Method that checks if there is any admin user in the system

sendResetPasswordEmail.name: Send password reset email
sendResetPasswordEmail.description: Method that sends an email to reset the user's password

createUser.message: It was not possible to create the user.

notLoggedUser.message:
You are not authenticated.

onlyAdmCanCreateAdm.message: Only administrative users can create another administrator user.

createAdminUser.title: Admin User Registration
createAdminUser.description: No administrator user was found registered in the system. Please register a new administrator user.

signIn.subWelcome: Sign in with your data to access your account
signIn.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.emailSentMessage: If the email provided is registered in the system, we will send a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.emailConfirmationMessage: Confirm your email below to receive a password reset link.

resetPassword.title: Password Reset
resetPassword.minimum6: Password must be at least 6 characters long

enrollAccount.title: Password Definition
enrollAccount.welcomeMessage: Welcome to {{appName}}. To continue, please set a new password.
enrollAccount.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long

notifications.resetPasswordSuccessMessage: Your password has been changed successfully. Welcome back!
notifications.enrollAccountSuccessMessage: Your password has been set successfully.
